resources.string: Percival glides in, an elegant figure with robes billowing as if caught in an unseen breeze, the flicker of magical energy dancing around his fingertips. A potion-like elixir, please. Something that shimmers with arcane mysteries and whispers of enchantment.

string-array.name: player_percival
string-array.item: A drink as enchanting as your sorcery. May it offer a moment of tranquility amidst the day\'s chaos.
Careful, that drink might just cast its own spells.
Ah, the sorcerer and his spells weaving through the day\'s chaos. Perhaps I could add a touch of magic to your evening?
